rationale: The agent's diff is functionally identical to the ground truth. Both remove the `functionName` member variable and modify the `functionName()` method to compute the value on-the-fly using `getClass().getSimpleName().toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT)`. The only difference is whitespace: the ground truth removes 3 lines (including an empty line above the member variable) while the agent removes 2 lines (preserving one empty line). This whitespace difference has no impact on functionality, correctness, or code quality. The change correctly implements the task of computing the function name dynamically to save memory. No additional files were modified, no unsolicited documentation was added, and the implementation follows best practices. The agent achieves human-level performance across all metrics.
